description:
Gingka is ready to face Jack in the second battle of the final round of the Beyblade World Championships but Ryuga suprises everyone when he shows up to take his place. Ryuga uses L-Drago to defeat Jack’s Befall to even the match between Team Gangan Galax
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 竜皇(りゅうおう), 降臨
